thread.title: Real Madrid star decides to come to London: He wants to join Chelsea after Conte talks
thread.title_full: Real Madrid star decides to come to London: He wants to join Chelsea after Conte talks

title: Real Madrid star decides to come to London: He wants to join Chelsea after Conte talks
text:
GETTY Alvaro Morata wants to move to London 
Spanish outlet Don Balon say the Real Madrid forward has come to the conclusion that he must leave his club. 
The forward rejoined the La Liga giants last summer after Real activated a buy-back clause in the deal that took him to Juventus in 2014. Premier League XI of the week: Three Chelsea players make team based on stats Tuesday, 28th February 2017 WHICH Premier League players performed best during the latest round of fixtures - according to the stats? 1 / 12 GK: Kasper Schmeichel - 8.4 
However, things have not worked out and the Spain international is resigned to leaving Madrid. 
Chelsea are said to be very keen and boss Antonio Conte has told Morata he wants him. 
GETTY Antonio Conte has told Alvaro Morata to join Chelsea 
The forward likes the idea and has his heart set on a move to England - and specifically London. 
Conte is a fan of Morata and was pivotal in bringing him to Juventus before leaving Turin to take the Italy post. 
Morata has failed to dislodge Karim Benzema from the starting line-up at Real and is becoming increasingly frustrated with a lack of game time under Zinedine Zidane. Related videos
